nodes.name: createAndStartRawAlarmClock

devdoc.author: Joseph Reed
devdoc.details: This contract's goal is to make it super easy to create a recurring alarm clock by setting several default values

params._defaultFactory: The default factory contract responsible for deploying decentralized alarm clocks
params._defaultOracle: The default gas price oracle responsible for predicting future gas costs

params.delegate: The delegate from which to pull alarm payments
params.wallet: The funding wallet, change address, and owner of the deployed alarms

createAlarmClock(address,address).return: The recurring alarm clock contract address

params.callOptions: The options defining how and when to trigger the alarm clock
params.delegate: The delegate from which to pull alarm payments
params.wallet: The funding wallet, change address, and owner of the deployed alarms

createAndStartAlarmClock(address,address.return: The recurring alarm clock contract address

params.callOptions: The options defining how and when to trigger the alarm clock
params.customCaller: The custom caller receives a base amount of the alarm fee regardless of if they call the alarm.
params.customLimits: The ethereum alarm clock limits used when calling decentralized alarms.
params.customOracle: The feed that supplies the current network gas price
params.delegate: The delegate from which to pull alarm payments
params.wallet: The funding wallet, change address, and owner of the deployed alarms

createAndStartRawAlarmClock(address,addr.return: The recurring alarm clock contract address

devdoc.title: RecurringAlarmClockWizard Contract

methods.constructor: Constructor to create a RecurringAlarmClockWizard which aids in creating an alarm clock

createAlarmClock(address,address).notice: Creates an alarm clock belonging to the specified wallet

createAndStartAlarmClock(address,address.notice: Creates and starts an alarm clock belonging to the specified wallet with the specified call options
